entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Brockville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brockville 12:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -8.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 51 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: NNE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
